laboratory_examinations.findings: Lung bases: Atelectasis and a small right pleural effusion at the right lung base. Abdomen: liver, spleen, adrenals, gallbladder and biliary tree, pancreas appear unremarkable. Left kidney demonstrates nonobstructing calculi in its lower pole, largest measures 8 mm. A colostomy within the left lower quadrant. Small amount of free fluid within the small bowel mesentery. Severe aortic and iliac atherosclerosis. Pelvis: Surgical drain present, persistent inflammatory stranding surrounding the rectosigmoid stump and adjacent small bowel loops. No drainable abscess or fluid collection. A small left bladder diverticulum.
